# x402-deploy

> Turn any API or MCP server into a paid service with x402 

## Overview

x402-deploy is an open-source project by nirholas. Turn any API or MCP server into a paid service with x402 

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/x402-deploy
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
